title: Las Invisibles
overview: Las Invisibles centres around a group of maids who clean the rooms of a luxury hotel in the Mediterranean, while attempting to restructure their own lives. The story portrays the reality of women who struggle to earn a living yet always have a moment to smile. The series offers a large dose of optimism, in a world where life's little pleasures come together with the ability to overcome, dignity, love, and musical reverie.
